## PointerController.tick() method

Must be called periodically.

**Signature:**

```typescript
tick(deltaTime: number, // THREE.Clock.getDelta()
    rayOrigin?: THREE.Object3D): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  deltaTime | number | <code>THREE.Clock.getDelta()</code> |
|  rayOrigin | THREE.Object3D | _(Optional)_ Laser pointer emission source |

**Returns:**

void

## Example


```ts
const clock = new THREE.Clock();
renderer.setAnimationLoop(() => {
  const dt = clock.getDelta();
  pointerController.tick(dt, handHolder.leftHand);
});
```
or

```ts
const clock = new THREE.Clock();
setInterval(() => {
  const dt = clock.getDelta();
  pointerController.tick(dt, handHolder.leftHand);
}, anything);
```
